response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special offer price of $950,000. This is a generous discount that reflects my confidence in its worth and my desire to see it in capable hands. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
